Creating a template from <em>{{titleWith: Creare un modello da {{titleWithDefault}} è un'azione non distruttiva - faremo una copia del documento e lo convertiremo in un modello, così che potrà essere usato come punto d'inizio per nuovi documenti.
Sorry, part of the application failed to: Spiacenti, parte dell'applicazione non si è caricata correttamente. È possibile che sia stata aggiornata da quando hai aperto la scheda oppure è fallita una richiesta di rete. Si prega di ricaricare la pagina.
Sorry, an unrecoverable error occurred{{: Spiacenti, si è verificato un errore irreversibile{{notified}}. Prova a ricaricare la pagina, potrebbe essere un problema temporaneo.

Exporting the collection <em>{{collectio: Esportare la collezione {{collectionName}} potrebbe richiedere del tempo.
Your documents will be a zip of folders: I tuoi documenti verranno salvati in un archivio zip con file in formato Markdown. Visita la sezione Esporta in Impostazioni per ottenere il file archivio.
Collections are for grouping your docume: Le collezioni servono a raggruppare i tuoi documenti. Funzionano meglio quando riguardano un argomento o un team interno — ad esempio "prodotti" o "ingegneria".
This is the default level of access, you: Questo è il livello predefinito di accesso, è possibile dare ai singoli utenti o gruppi diversi accessi una volta creata la raccolta.
When enabled any documents within this c: Se abilitato, tutti i documenti all'interno di questa collezione possono essere condivisi pubblicamente su internet.

Are you sure about that? Deleting the <e: Are you sure about that? Deleting the {{ documentTitle }} document will delete all of its history.
Are you sure about that? Deleting the {{ documentTitle }} document will delete all of its history and one nested document.
Are you sure about that? Deleting the {{ documentTitle }} document will delete all of its history and {{ any }} nested documents.

Couldn’t create the document, try again?: Couldn’t create the document, try again?
Are you sure you want to permanently del: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the {{ documentTitle }} document? This action is immediate and cannot be undone.
Heads up – moving the document <em>{{ ti: Heads up – moving the document {{ title }} to the {{ newCollectionName }} collection will grant all members of the workspace {{ newPermission }}, they currently have {{ prevPermission }}.

A team admin (<em>{{ suspendedContactEma: Un amministratore del team ({{ suspendedContactEmail }}) ha sospeso il tuo account. Per riattivare il tuo account, contattalo direttamente.
Are you sure about that? Deleting the <e: Are you sure about that? Deleting the {{groupName}} group will cause its members to lose access to collections and documents that it is associated with.
You can edit the name of this group at a: You can edit the name of this group at any time, however doing so too often might confuse your team mates.
Add members below to give them access to: Add members below to give them access to the group. Need to add someone who’s not yet a member?
Add and remove members to the <em>{{grou: Add and remove members to the {{groupName}} group. Members of the group will have access to any collections this group has been added to.
Groups are for organizing your team. The: Groups are for organizing your team. They work best when centered around a function or a responsibility — Support or Engineering for example.
You’ll be able to add people to the grou: You’ll be able to add people to the group next.
Weird, this shouldn’t ever be empty: Weird, this shouldn’t ever be empty

Documents you’ve recently viewed will be: Documents you’ve recently viewed will be here for easy access
Those email addresses are already invite: Those email addresses are already invited
Sorry, you can only send {{MAX_INVITES}}: Sorry, you can only send {{MAX_INVITES}} invites at a time
Invite members or guests to join your wo: Invite members or guests to join your workspace. They can sign in with {{signinMethods}} or use their email address.
Invite members to join your workspace. T: Invite members to join your workspace. They will need to sign in with {{signinMethods}}.
As an admin you can also <2>enable email: As an admin you can also <2>enable email sign-in</2>.
Want a link to share directly with your: Want a link to share directly with your team?

The domains which should be allowed to c: The domains which should be allowed to create new accounts using SSO. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
Please choose a single file to import: Please choose a single file to import
Your import is being processed, you can: Your import is being processed, you can safely leave this page
File not supported – please upload a val: File not supported – please upload a valid ZIP file
Drag and drop the zip file from Notion's: Drag and drop the zip file from Notion's HTML export option, or click to upload
Where do I find the file?: Where do I find the file?
In Notion, click <em>Settings & Members<: In Notion, click Settings & Members in the left sidebar and open Settings. Look for the Export section, and click Export all workspace content. Choose HTML as the format for the best data compatability.
Drag and drop the zip file from Outline': Drag and drop the zip file from Outline's export option, or click to upload
You can import a zip file that was previ: You can import a zip file that was previously exported from an Outline installation – collections, documents, and images will be imported. In Outline, open Export in the Settings sidebar and click on Export Data.
Posting to the <em>{{ channelName }}</em: Posting to the {{ channelName }} channel on
These events should be posted to Slack: These events should be posted to Slack
Are you sure you want to revoke the {{ t: Are you sure you want to revoke the {{ tokenName }} token?
Are you sure you want to delete the {{ n: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ name }} webhook?
Provide a descriptive name for this webh: Provide a descriptive name for this webhook and the URL we should send a POST request to when matching events are created.
Subscribe to all events, groups, or indi: Subscribe to all events, groups, or individual events. We recommend only subscribing to the minimum amount of events that your application needs to function.
These settings affect the way that your: These settings affect the way that your knowledge base appears to everyone on the team.
The logo is displayed at the top left of: The logo is displayed at the top left of the application.
The workspace name, usually the same as: The workspace name, usually the same as your company name.
Your knowledge base will be accessible a: Your knowledge base will be accessible at
Choose a subdomain to enable a login pag: Choose a subdomain to enable a login page just for your team.
This is the screen that workspace member: This is the screen that workspace members will first see when they sign in.
A full export might take some time, cons: A full export might take some time, consider exporting a single document or collection. The exported data is a zip of your documents in Markdown format. You may leave this page once the export has started – if you have notifications enabled, we will email a link to {{ userEmail }} when it’s complete.
Manage optional and beta features. Chang: Manage optional and beta features. Changing these settings will affect the experience for all members of the workspace.
When enabled documents are always editab: When enabled documents are always editable for team members that have permission. When disabled there is a separate editing view.
Show your team’s logo on public pages li: Show your team’s logo on public pages like login and shared documents.
Groups can be used to organize and manag: Groups can be used to organize and manage the people on your team.
No groups have been created yet: No groups have been created yet
Quickly transfer your existing documents: Quickly transfer your existing documents, pages, and files from other tools and services into Outline. You can also drag and drop any HTML, Markdown, and text documents directly into Collections in the app.
Import a backup file that was previously: Import a backup file that was previously exported from Outline
Import pages from a Confluence instance: Import pages from a Confluence instance
Everyone that has signed into Outline ap: Everyone that has signed into Outline appears here. It’s possible that there are other users who have access through {team.signinMethods} but haven’t signed in yet.
Receive a notification whenever a new do: Receive a notification whenever a new document is published
Receive a notification when a document y: Receive a notification when a document you created is edited
Receive a notification whenever a new co: Receive a notification whenever a new collection is created
Receive a notification when someone you: Receive a notification when someone you invited creates an account
Receive a notification when an export yo: Receive a notification when an export you requested has been completed
Tips on getting started with Outline’s f: Tips on getting started with Outline’s features and functionality
Receive an email when new features of no: Receive an email when new features of note are added
Unsubscription successful. Your notifica: Unsubscription successful. Your notification settings were updated
Manage when and where you receive email: Manage when and where you receive email notifications.
Your email address should be updated in: Your email address should be updated in your SSO provider.
The email integration is currently disab: The email integration is currently disabled. Please set the associated environment variables and restart the server to enable notifications.
Manage settings that affect your persona: Manage settings that affect your personal experience.
Choose the interface language. Community: Choose the interface language. Community translations are accepted though our <2>translation portal</2>.
Show a hand cursor when hovering over in: Show a hand cursor when hovering over interactive elements.
Show line numbers on code blocks in docu: Show line numbers on code blocks in documents.
Automatically return to the document you: Automatically return to the document you were last viewing when the app is re-opened.
You may delete your account at any time,: Puoi cancellare il tuo account in qualsiasi momento, tieni presente che l'eliminazione non è reversibile
Manage how you appear to other members o: Manage how you appear to other members of the workspace.
Choose a photo or image to represent you: Choose a photo or image to represent yourself.
This could be your real name, or a nickn: This could be your real name, or a nickname — however you’d like people to refer to you.
Are you sure you want to require invites: Are you sure you want to require invites?
New users will first need to be invited: New users will first need to be invited to create an account. Default role and Allowed domains will no longer apply.
Settings that impact the access, securit: Settings that impact the access, security, and content of your knowledge base.
Allow members to sign-in with {{ authPro: Allow members to sign-in with {{ authProvider }}
Allow members to sign-in using their ema: Allow members to sign-in using their email address
The server must have SMTP configured to: The server must have SMTP configured to enable this setting
Require members to be invited to the wor: Require members to be invited to the workspace before they can create an account using SSO.
The default user role for new accounts. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
When enabled, documents can be shared pu: When enabled, documents can be shared publicly on the internet by any member of the workspace
When enabled, viewers can see download o: When enabled, viewers can see download options for documents
Links to supported services are shown as: Links to supported services are shown as rich embeds within your documents
Allow members to create new collections: Allow members to create new collections within the knowledge base
Add your self-hosted draw.io installatio: Add your self-hosted draw.io installation url here to enable automatic embedding of diagrams within documents.
You can globally enable and disable publ: You can globally enable and disable public document sharing in the security settings.
Documents that have been shared are list: Documents that have been shared are listed below. Anyone that has the public link can access a read-only version of the document until the link has been revoked.
Whoops, you need to accept the permissio: Whoops, you need to accept the permissions in Slack to connect Outline to your team. Try again?
Something went wrong while authenticatin: Something went wrong while authenticating your request. Please try logging in again?
Get rich previews of Outline links share: Get rich previews of Outline links shared in Slack and use the {{ command }} slash command to search for documents without leaving your chat.
Connect Outline collections to Slack cha: Connect Outline collections to Slack channels and messages will be automatically posted to Slack when documents are published or updated.
The Slack integration is currently disab: The Slack integration is currently disabled. Please set the associated environment variables and restart the server to enable the integration.
You can create an unlimited amount of pe: You can create an unlimited amount of personal tokens to authenticate with the API. Tokens have the same permissions as your user account. For more details see the developer documentation.
Webhooks can be used to notify your appl: Webhooks can be used to notify your application when events happen in Outline. Events are sent as a https request with a JSON payload in near real-time.
Zapier is a platform that allows Outline: Zapier is a platform that allows Outline to easily integrate with thousands of other business tools. Automate your workflows, sync data, and more.
Your are creating a new workspace using: Your are creating a new workspace using your current account — {{email}}
When your new workspace is created, you: When your new workspace is created, you will be the admin, meaning you will have the highest level of permissions and the ability to invite others.
There are no templates just yet.
You can create templates to help your te: You can create templates to help your team create consistent and accurate documentation.
Al momento il cestino è vuoto.
A confirmation code has been sent to you: A confirmation code has been sent to your email address, please enter the code below to permanantly destroy your account.
<em>Note:</em> Signing back in will caus: Note: Signing back in will cause a new account to be automatically reprovisioned.
Are you sure? Deleting your account will: Are you sure? Deleting your account will destroy identifying data associated with your user and cannot be undone. You will be immediately logged out of Outline and all your API tokens will be revoked.
{{ userName }} hasn’t updated any docume: {{ userName }} non ha ancora aggiornato nessun documento.
